entries.title_d: To start off our operations in the Dathomir section we need you to obtain some security codes from an Imperial security officer. We can use these codes to infiltrate and decimate the Imperial fleets infrastructure in this system.
entries.title: Dathomir system: Kidnap Imperial security officer.
entries.thanks_5: Target vessels sensors show attack fighters type TIE terminated.
entries.thanks_4: Target vessels sensors show attack fighters type TIE terminated.
entries.thanks_3: Target vessels sensors show attack fighters type TIE terminated.
entries.thanks_2: Target vessels sensors show attack fighters type TIE terminated.
entries.thanks_1: Target vessels sensors show attack fighters type TIE terminated.
entries.taunt_5: Shut down your engines, in the name of the Emperor!
entries.taunt_4: You have one chance to surrender or we will destroy you all!
entries.taunt_3: You thought we would just let you fly out of here?
entries.taunt_1: There is no way you're leaving this system with that man onboard, even if it means his death!
entries.target_disabled: Tactical Computer: < Scans show target vessel disabled. >
entries.split_quest_alert: Alright, time to put those codes to good use. Contacting our infiltration squad for rendez-vous coordinates.
entries.recovery_success: Great work pilot, this should make our operation a lot easier.
entries.quest_recover_d: The space assault droid is taking charge of the shuttle. Protect it from any outside interference in the meantime.
entries.quest_location_d: The Dathomir system, much like the planet, is a dangerous place. It's heavily guarded by the Empire as they seem to not want anyone getting access to, or perhaps leave, the planet of Dathomir. Every mission in this system should be considered high risk.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the stolen shuttle to safety. Imperial ships will almost certainly try to interfere so stay sharp!.
entries.quest_disable_d: Disable the officers shuttle so that your space assault droid can take control of the ship.
entries.panic_5: Target vessels sensors indicate attack fighters type TIE trying to terminate unit.
entries.panic_4: Target vessels sensors indicate attack fighters type TIE trying to terminate unit.
entries.panic_3: Target vessels sensors indicate attack fighters type TIE trying to terminate unit.
entries.panic_2: Target vessels sensors indicate attack fighters type TIE trying to terminate unit.
entries.panic_1: Target vessels sensors indicate attack fighters type TIE trying to terminate unit.
entries.failed_escape: We lost contact with him, he must have reached territory scrambled by the Empire. Return to base pilot.
entries.failed_destroy: Bah, we're going to have to find a different way to infiltrate the fleet.
entries.escort_wiped_out: Tactical Computer: < Sensors show no remaining target escort vessels. >
entries.escort_remaining: Tactical Computer: < Sensors show %DI remaining target escort vessel. >
entries.complete: Navigation computer shows that target vessel has reached escape coordinates.
entries.capture_started: Space Assault Droid: < Unit shows target vessel disabled, initiating attack sequence. >
entries.capture_phase_1_5: Unit triggering laser cutter, breaching target vessel hull.
entries.capture_phase_1_4: Unit triggering laser cutter, breaching target vessel hull.
entries.capture_phase_1_3: Unit triggering laser cutter, breaching target vessel hull.
entries.capture_phase_1_2: Unit triggering laser cutter, breaching target vessel hull.
entries.capture_phase_1_1: Unit triggering laser cutter, breaching target vessel hull.
entries.capture_phase_1: Unit triggering laser cutter, breaching target vessel hull.
entries.capture_complete: Space Assault Droid: < Unit has control over vessel. Subject pacified. Piloting to pre-programmed coordinates. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.arrival_phase_2: Found him, intercept him immediately. We will update coordinates of his ship as often as we can but hurry.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Tracking the Security Officers ship now, stand by.
entries.angry_disable: I will never give up any information to you, Rebel scum!
entries.abort: Abort code received. Initiating emergency hyperspace jump.
